title: Project-Based Discussion Task Design to Improve Self-Regulated Learning in Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and Moodle platform usage experience
context.additional_context: A course supporting advanced science learners in developing self-regulated learning strategies through online discussion assignments.

learning_goals: Through Moodle discussion assignments, learners establish self-regulated learning strategies based on online learning experiences
Learners apply deep learning approaches in scientific problem-solving processes by utilizing peer and instructor feedback
In project-based learning environments, learners overcome challenges of new learning tools by leveraging situational interest
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
